arts.ttl: Lecce vs. Sassuolo: building on momentum
arts.sum: The previous meetings in Lecce between the two teams total 5, with the home side never victorious: the record stands at 3 draws and 2 away wins for the Neroverdi (Sassuolo). Fabio Grosso collected his 100th victory as a professional first-team coach in the away match at Verona (97 in Serie B and 3 in Serie A).

Lecce's long awaited search for a Serie A victory came last time out against Parma where they won 1-0. It ended five games without a win. Sassuolo could temporarily move into the European places with...

arts.ttl: Lecce vs Sassuolo - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Serie A clash between Lecce and Sassuolo, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
